alert.note: Alert for Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:43PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Starr and southeastern Zapata Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lopeno, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Viboras, Lopeno, El Sauz, New Falcon and Santa Catarina. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 786 and 790. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for Deep South Texas.
